knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r exercise 1.1 & 1.2}
gapminder %>%
  filter(year >= 1970, year < 1980, country %in% c("France" , "Spain", "Italy")) %>% 
  select( country, gdpPercap)

```

```{r exercise 1.3 }
gapminder %>% 
  mutate(increaseLifeExp = if_else(lifeExp > lag(lifeExp,1), lifeExp - lag(lifeExp,1), -1)) %>%
  filter(increaseLifeExp == -1) 
```

```{r exercise 1.4}
gapminder %>% 
  group_by(country) %>%
  filter(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap))

```

```{r exercise 1.5}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Canada") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = lifeExp, y = gdpPercap)) + geom_point() + scale_y_continuous(trans='log2') +theme_bw()
```
